sources.title: Deadly Duo
sources.description: Title: Deadly Duo Summary: Two identical twin sisters...one is very,very good--one is very, very bad. The good twin is due some big bucks. The bad twin wants 'em. Since they look just alike...look out. Directed by: Reginald Le Borg Actors: Craig Hill, Marcia Henderson, Robert Lowery Production Company: Robert E. Kent Productions Release Date: February 1962 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Two identical twin sisters...one is very,very good--one is very, very bad. The good twin is due some big bucks. The bad twin wants 'em. Since they look just alike...look out.

metadata.Plot: Two identical twin sisters...one is very,very good--one is very, very bad. The good twin is due some big bucks. The bad twin wants 'em. Since they look just alike...look out.
